channel.title: Why doesnt it say admin on 508?
channel.description: Please help me :S When i change the name for admin/mod from umair/ i kieran i it says i have but when i log in on the other acc(s) it not admin/mod Why is this?? Do i have to compile or something?? :S If so WHERE?? :'( regards <I K O I>

item.title: Why doesnt it say admin on 508?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Stijn_Scape Owner Stijn Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Stijn_Scape wrote:

           }
            if (p.username.equals("umair")) {
                p.rights = 2;
            }
            if (p.username.equals("aof range")) {
                p.rights = 2;
            }

[/quote]

i don’t know but try to change that

p.rights = 2;

to

p.rights = 3;

(i don’t know if thats good)

or else change both names to ur name =)

hope it helped some

item.title: Why doesnt it say admin on 508?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Compiler: Cmd folder, The file titled ‘All’.
Notes: When replacing your name, with umairs, do NOT put ANY capitol letters or it WILL NOT WORK.
